New Records: Arshdeep Singh achieved a career best four for nine
Key Match Events: India beat USA by seven wickets with ten balls to spare
Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 3 runs
Virat Kohli was dismissed for 0 runs
Rishabh Pant was dismissed for 18 runs
Arshdeep Singh took four wickets for nine runs
USA was given a five-run penalty for breaching the sixty second gap between overs
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones said USA was 10-15 runs short of a competitive total
Rohit Sharma said India knew it was going to be a tough task and they lost some wickets early
Arshdeep Singh said the plan was to hit the hard lengths and use the wicket more at the death
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones said USA will have a few meetings and come hard against Ireland for sure
Rohit Sharma said India is happy to see the progress of the USA team and they wish them the best
Arshdeep Singh said he is very pleased with his performance and the team has kept backing him

The USA team will also ensure qualification for the next round if they beat Ireland on Friday
England will take on Oman in a must-win game on the next day
Others: The match was played at a low-scoring ground in T20 WC history
The USA team was second in Group A with four points after suffering their first loss in three matches
